reviewText: I was looking for a video with instructions on different Tantra exercises that couples could engage in together. This was NOT what I was looking for. This was video footage of someone giving a lecture - and not a very captivating one. Although I am interested in the subject of Tantra, I quickly lost interest in the video. I forced myself to keep watching, hoping it would get better, but finally gave up. I still haven't finished watching it and probably should get rid of it. It's just collecting dust on a shelf right now.
disappointed that it was just a taping of her lecture- short, not enough Q & A and seemed very general
